tool_description: Generates shipping labels and related documentation for packages using carrier APIs and order information.

service_type.description: Shipping service type (ground, express, overnight, etc.)

include_return_label.description: Whether to generate a return label

error_messages: Order not found: The specified order_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid carrier: Carrier not supported or not configured for label generation.
Invalid service type: Service type not available for the selected carrier.
Label generation failed: Carrier API error during label creation.
Unsupported label format: Format must be one of [PDF, PNG, ZPL].
usage: Provide order_id, carrier_name, and service_type. Optionally specify label_format and whether to include_return_label.

tracking_number.description: Generated tracking number for the shipment

label_url.description: URL to download the shipping label

return_label_url.description: URL to download return label if requested
